name: Handball 7v7
description:
Executable file is now available for download!

Scatch URL: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/509075507/

***HOW TO PLAY***

* Handball Basics: The game has 2 periods, 30 minutes each. Field players (LW, LB, CB, RB, RW and PV) can perform shots as long as they don't step on 6m area. You can push/grab the attacker to stop them.

*El juego dura 2 tiempos, de 30 min c/u. Los jugadores de campo (EI, LI, C, LD, ED y PV) pueden lanzar por fuera del area de 6m. La defensa puede agarrar y detener al rival atacante.

*Controls:

ATTACK/ATAQUE

-Click on a player to pass the ball towards him/her. Click a un jugador para darle un pase

-You can move a player with WASD if they have the ball. Mueve al jugador que tiene el balón con WASD

-Shoot to goal with Spacebar, point with mouse!

Lanza al arco con BARRA ESPACIO, apunta con el ratón!

-When you shoot, point with mouse where you want to shoot. (Wing LW/RW) If you point outside the goal, you can perform a spinshot. (Back court LB/CB/RB) You may do a feint to the right or left depending on your position on the field.

Al lanzar apunta con el ratón. Extremos hacen roscas si apuntas hacia afuera del arco! Laterales/central pueden fintar hacia izq. o der. dependiendo de posición.

_____________________________________

DEFENCE/DEFENSA

-To defend, choose wich player to move by clicking, move him/her with WASD

Elige con que jugador defiendes haciendole click. Muévelo con WASD.

- Move the whole defensive block with TFGH.

Mueve a toda la defensa con TFGH!

- You can also select the goalie and catch the ball!

Incluso puedes elegir al arquero y atajar!
